member.name: T:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Input.C1AutoComplete
member.summary: The auto-complete control is an editable input control that shows completion suggestions automatically while the user is typing. The list of suggestions is displayed in a drop down menu from which the user.

member.name: T:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Input.C1MaskedEntry
member.summary: Masked editor provides a way to govern what a user is allowed to input. The control prevents users from accidentally entering invalid data and saves time by skipping over literals (such as slashes in dates) as the user types.

member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Input.C1MaskedEntry.Mask
member.summary: Gets or sets the mask used to validate input as the user types. The mask must be a string composed of one or more of the masking elements.

member.name: P:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Input.C1MaskedEntry.PromptChar
member.summary: Gets or sets the symbol used to show input positions in the control.

member.name: P:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Input.C1MaskedEntry.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the raw value of the control (excluding prompt and mask literals)

member.summary: Event raised when the text property changed.

member.summary: DropDown interaction behavior.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Input.DropDownBehavior.ButtonTap
member.summary: The drop-down appears when the user taps the button.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Input.DropDownBehavior.HeaderTap
member.summary: The drop-down appears when the user taps any part of the header.

member.name: T:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Input.DropDownMode
member.summary: DropDown display mode.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Input.DropDownMode.FullScreen
member.summary: DropDownView is displayed in separate FullScreen page (similar to navigationpage) where user can select from list or navigate backwards by hitting back button

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Input.DropDownMode.AboveOrBelow
member.summary: Tries to open the drop-down above the header. If it’s not possible it tries to open below.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Input.DropDownMode.BelowOrAbove
member.summary: Tries to open the drop-down below the header. If it’s not possible it tries to open above. (default value).

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Input.DropDownMode.ForceAbove
member.summary: Forces the drop-down to open above the header.

member.name: F:C1.Xamarin.Forms.Input.DropDownMode.ForceBelow
member.summary: Forces the drop-down to open below the header.
